com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata

Class TaskLabelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.taskdata.TaskLabelReader

  • public class TaskLabelReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides read access to task labels which are (only) read by the Scheduler.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskLabelReader(TaskInfo.Builder taskInfoBuilder) 
      TaskLabelReader(TaskInfo taskInfo)

      Returns the pod instance index of the task, or throws TaskException if no index data was found.

      Returns the string representations of any Offer Attributes which were embedded in the task.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getRegion()
      Returns the Region in which the Task was launched.
      java.util.UUID getTargetConfiguration()
      Returns the ID referencing a configuration in a ConfigStore associated with the task.

      Returns the task type string, which was embedded in the task.

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
                         throws TaskException
        Returns the task type string, which was embedded in the task.
        Throws:
        TaskException - if the type could not be found.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex()
             throws TaskException,
                    java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Returns the pod instance index of the task, or throws TaskException if no index data was found.
        Throws:
        TaskException - if the index data wasn't found
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - if parsing the index as an integer failed

      • getOfferAttributeStrings

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOfferAttributeStrings()

      • getTargetConfiguration

        public java.util.UUID getTargetConfiguration()
                                      throws TaskException
        Returns the ID referencing a configuration in a ConfigStore associated with the task.
        Returns:
        the ID of the target configuration for the provided TaskInfo
        Throws:
        TaskException - when a TaskInfo is provided which does not contain a Label with an indicated target configuration

      • isReadinessCheckSucceeded

        public boolean isReadinessCheckSucceeded(TaskStatus taskStatus)
        Returns whether or not a readiness check succeeded. If the indicated TaskInfo does not have a readiness check, then this method indicates that the readiness check has passed. Otherwise failures to parse readiness checks are interpreted as readiness check failures. If some value other than "true" is present in the readiness check label of the TaskStatus, the readiness check has failed.
        Parameters:
        taskStatus - A TaskStatus which may or may not contain a readiness check outcome label
        Returns:
        the result of a readiness check for the indicated TaskStatus

      • isPermanentlyFailed

        public boolean isPermanentlyFailed()
        Returns whether the task is marked as permanently failed. This is intentionally stored in the TaskInfo as it will be automatically overwritten when the TaskInfo is replaced.

      • hasReadinessCheckLabel

        public boolean hasReadinessCheckLabel()
        Returns whether the task has a readiness check label.
